mapper.select: select notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , to_char(notice_enrolldate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') notice_enrolldate , notice_count from notice where notice_status = 'Y' order by notice_no desc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_count = notice_count + 1 where notice_no = #{nno} and notice_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select notice_no , notice_title , notice_content , to_char(notice_enrolldate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') notice_enrolldate , to_char(notice_changedate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') notice_changedate , notice_count from notice where notice_status = 'Y' and notice_no = #{noticeNo}
